SEARCH
Package net.elena.murat.material.pbr

Interface PBRCapableMaterial

All Superinterfaces:
Material
All Known Implementing Classes:
CeramicTilePBRMaterial, ChromePBRMaterial, CopperPBRMaterial, GlassicTilePBRMaterial, GoldPBRMaterial, HolographicPBRMaterial, MarblePBRMaterial, PlasticPBRMaterial, SilverPBRMaterial, WaterPBRMaterial, WoodPBRMaterial
public interface PBRCapableMaterial extends Material
PBRCapableMaterial is an interface for materials that support Physically Based Rendering. It extends the basic Material interface and adds PBR-specific properties.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Color
    getAlbedo()
    Returns the base color (albedo) of the material.
    MaterialType
    getMaterialType()
    Returns the type of PBR material (e.g., METAL, DIELECTRIC).
    double
    getMetalness()
    Returns the metalness factor [0.0 (dielectric) to 1.0 (metal)].
    double
    getRoughness()
    Returns the surface roughness [0.0 (smooth) to 1.0 (rough)].

    Methods inherited from interface net.elena.murat.material.Material

    getColorAt, getIndexOfRefraction, getReflectivity, getTransparency, setObjectTransform
